name: Layouts for Elementor
author: Techeshta

sections.description:
Layouts for Elementor is an effective and user-friendly way to create a one-page WordPress website. An Elementor addon gives you a top-niche readymade landing page or layouts for your favorite WordPress Elementor page builder. It is a flexible and straightforward way to import your WordPress site via a one-click import Template or ‘Create New Page.’

Layouts for Elementor plugin comes with precisely designed 30+ layouts for all types of start-up businesses. It is a one-stop solution for your one-page professional WordPress websites. You can build a store that matches your brand.

It is the perfect choice for your business. Users will love your site because it gives them a unique user experience (UX) and User Interface (UI). Whether you are a beginner, WordPress user, designer, or developer, it’s a user-friendly layout plugin. No additional coding skills are required.

Live Demo

Where Are Layouts for Elementor Plugin is Useful?

Layouts for Elementor plugin suitable for all kinds of one-page WordPress websites. Below is one small list for which purposes you can use the Layouts for Elementor WordPress plugin.

  • Personal Portfolio Website
  • Ecommerce Website
  • Fashion Website
  • Wedding Website
  • Cleaning Services Website
  • Traveling Website
  • Restaurant Website
  • Education Related Website
  • Digital Agency Website
  • Photography Website
  • Fitness Related Website
  • Beauty Related Website
  • Etc.

Precisely Designed 50+ Layouts

We have designed a stunning landing page for you to complete your landing page website in less time. You can use the default settings for each template or modify it as per your need.

  • Fredo Saas Landing Page
  • Travel Guide Landing Page
  • Blatropt Saas Landing Page
  • Nectar Cafe Landing Page
  • Business Corporate Landing Page
  • Resto Landing Page
  • Super Service Mockup
  • Web Agency Landing Page
  • Vertigo Web Development Landing Page
  • Analytics Landing Page
  • Marketing Landing Page
  • Development Agency Landing Page
  • Portfolio Landing Page
  • Restaurant Landing Page
  • Education E-learning Landing Page
  • Crezy Yoga Landing Page
  • Event Jungle
  • Photographer
  • Bire Real Estate
  • Web app
  • Wedding
  • Go Hub
  • Education World
  • Coffee shop
  • Gym Landing Page
  • Spa Landing Page
  • Mobile App Landing Page
  • Barberica Salon
  • Cleaning Services
  • Home Maintenance
  • The Pizzerio
  • Eye checkup
  • Pet care
  • Jewelery
  • Car autoparts
  • Finance
  • Dating
  • NFT Marketplace
  • Architecture Studio
  • Ice Cream
  • Drone
  • Laundry Business
  • Packers & Movers
  • Call Center
  • Business Administrations Services
  • Bookleth
  • Gamezone
  • Mental Health
  • Cardiologist and Medical
  • Heating & Cooling
  • More coming soon!

Powerfully Ultimate Plugin Features

1. 50+ Layout Templates

Select the pre-built layout design from up to 50 templates available.

2. Default Style and Settings

Every layout contains a default style and settings with its design—no need to worry about it if you don’t have much design knowledge.

3. Fully Responsive for Any Devices

It is fully responsive to smartphones, tablets, iPad, laptops, desktop computers, etc.

4. Cross-browser Compatibility

All templates are compatible with all major browsers like Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Safari, etc.

5. Easy To Install, Use, and Customize

The plugin is user-friendly, with no expertise required. Basic WordPress users can also easily use it.

6. SEO Friendly

Layouts for Elementor plugin is built with search engine optimization in mind to ensure better rankings across all search engines.

7. No Coding Skills Required

You don’t need any coding or technical skills to install and use the plugin. It installs just like any other plugin.

8. Optimized Performance

The plugin is built with performance in mind. So, the clean and optimized code ensures a blazing loading speed of the site.

9. Translation Ready

Compatible with WPML, the Layouts for Elementor plugin allows users to build multilingual Elementor websites more effortlessly than ever.

10. Fast and High Performance

Well, optimized and lightweight code that won’t hurt your server.

What Makes Layouts for Elementor Outstanding?

  • It’s 100% free for your personal and client’s projects.
  • Pick from the collections and one-click to import.
  • Category-wise filter to choose best for your digital agency.
  • Complete your landing page website in less than 5 minutes.
  • Clean code, layout, and design.

Layouts for Elementor Pro Features

Pro version overcomes your limitations with a lite version of Layouts for Elementor. There are available more layouts.

Layouts for Elementor PRO Plugin Features

  • Nailmaker Studio
  • Guitar Shop
  • Interior Design
  • Movie Box
  • Photography
  • Travel Agency
  • Personal Portfolio
  • Organic Food
  • Green Energy
  • Art Museum
  • Coffee Cafe
  • Insurance Company
  • Transportation and Logistics
  • Dance Studio
  • Yacht & Boat Rental
  • Wedding Planner
  • Child Care
  • Hotel Booking
  • More coming soon!

Buy Layouts for Elementor Pro

Layouts for Elementor Pro

Technical Support

We’re active for any support issues and feature suggestions. So, I hope you will love it. If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum.

Note: This plugin is an addon of Elementor Page Builder and will only work with Elementor page builder installed.

Like Layouts for Elementor?

Don’t forget to rate us on WordPress.
sections.installation:
From Your WordPress Dashboard

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for Layouts for Elementor
  3. Click on Install Now Button
  4. Click on Activate Now After Installed in the Backend

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Layouts for Elementor
  2. Upload the ‘layouts-for-elementor’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate Layouts for Elementor plugin from your plugins page
sections.faq:
For which purposes can I use Layouts for Elementor?

Layouts for Elementor give you top-niche readymade landing pages or designs for your favorite WordPress Elementor Page Builder.

Can I Import this readymade layout to my Elementor templates library?

Yes, you can. Layouts for Elementor plugin allow you to import any design to the Template Library and pages too!

Are all the starter templates free?

Yes, get over 30+ free ready-to-use websites as of now. You can pick a website template that suits your needs.

Can I change color or customize imported layouts as per my wish?

Yes, of course. Why not! You are free to use/modify it as per your project requirements.

Where can I ask for help?

You can reach out via the official support forum on WordPress.org.

1.2.2

Release Date: June 6th, 2019

  • Added: New 10+ Layouts
  • Updated: UI improvements
  • Fixed: Layouts Category AutoSync issue

1.2.1

Release Date: May 6th, 2019

  • Updated: UI improvements
  • Fixed: Template loading issue
  • Fixed: Minor bug fixes

1.2

Release Date: April 6th, 2019

  • Added: New feature – ‘Library Syncing’ to get new layouts via just one single click
  • Updated: Code with loader implementation and iFrame preview to view layouts in live action
  • Fixed: Minor bug fixes

1.1

Release Date: March 20th, 2019

  • Added: New 4 layouts
  • Updated: Code with API call to get updated with new layouts
  • Updated: Design tweaks for backend better UI

1.0

Release Date: February 21st, 2019

  • Initial release on WordPress.org. Enjoy!

short_description: Layouts for Elementor is a beautifully designed free layout for famous WordPress Elementor page builders.
